1.0.0.name: connect20/TGM_Voodoo
1.0.0.description: Our extension will integrate SMS features into your Magento store for free. When an order is placed, shipped or status changed you can confirm with your customer and/or store admin via a text message sent directly to their mobile phone.

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency
